name: Fighter Duel Pro: Flight Recorder
description:
Fighter Duel Pro Flight Recorder is a repackaged Fighter Duel Pro put together with a recorder software for the flights you make in the game, in order to create demonstration flights from the game, to be used with various other animation tools.

It was released both as a bundled package, and as an upgrade to existing Fighter Duel Pro owners. In order to do the recording, more RAM was required than for the original game. Output from the motion path generator was intended for use with NewTek’s LightWave 3D, Impulse’s Imagine, and Virtual Reality Labs’s Video Captions.
